content:
@Sebastien Rosset @Quinton Hoole @Stelian Pop
Jon has pushed to Testplugin changes to enable Collaborator circleCI builds to deploy to Cloudsmith alpha more reliably. I will be updating cel-nav and weather_routing to this TP version and adding some keys to CircleCI. This will hopefully be a a good solution going forward which provides the kind of capabilities needed for devs.
